title: Rich Wilson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #184
itunes:title: Rich Wilson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #184
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, podcaster and writer RICH WILSON!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with comic, podcaster and writer RICH WILSON!


I would be remiss if I didn’t mention that Rich and Brett go back a while in their real life friendship too. A lovely episode which is of course fueled by Rich’s warm and attentive ear and attitude, which you yourself might have become friends with in listening to his mental health / comedy podcast ‘Insane In The Men Brain’ (award for best title right there) - so it’s fascinating to hear about the movies that make Rich do all the human things that come with watching films… Yes including THAT question. A lovely one, including everything from beard faces to half century milestones to physical special effects to the Statham genre - have fun!


RICH LINKS

INSANE IN THE MEN BRAIN

TWITTER

HOME

SOULMATES

SUPERBOB (Brett's 2015 feature film)

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP

DISTRACTION PIECES NETWORK on INSTAGRAM

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
